Activity: Log in, check emails. Review feedback notes from yesterday's meeting.
Continue refining environment sketches based on team feedback. Adjust layouts and details as needed.
Take a break. Sketch personal ideas to clear mind.
Finalize all environment sketches. Ensure they meet the team's vision and are ready for submission.
Submit refined character designs (first pass) and rough environment sketches to @prod-1 for review.
Email @3dmod-1 and @3dmod-2 to discuss potential 3D modeling needs based on submitted designs.
Organize files and backup work. Prepare for any additional tasks or revisions.
Relax with some personal art projects or browsing art galleries online.
